srgk.value: • One uniform</br>• One set of poor weather gear</br>• One laspistol (Main Weapon),and two charge packs</br>• One knife</br>• One flak vest</br>• One rucksack or sling bag</br>• One set of basic tools</br>• One mess kit and one water canteen</br>• One blanket and one sleep bag</br>• One rechargeable lamp pack</br>• One grooming kit</br>• One set of cognomen tags or equivalent identification</br>• One primer or instructional handbook</br>• Combat sustenance rations, twoweeks’ supply
